name: Asbestos testing
text: The department of education shall be responsible for ensuring that asbestos testing is conducted on all suspected asbestos-containing materials, including exterior surfaces, and as required by the federal Asbestos Hazard Emergency Response Act of 1986 for interior surfaces, prior to any exterior or interior renovations or painting of school facilities at all department of education and conversion charter schools; provided that the surfaces have not previously been tested. [L 2005, c 186, §2; am L 2007, c 3, §2]
